title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same features as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (now renamed “Open WebUI”); runs in Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and Android compatibility.

title: ollama-rails
summary: Ruby gem that wraps the Ollama REST API for easy integration into Rails apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI REPL for chatting with Ollama models, written in Node.js.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models for QA and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker image and compose stacks (CPU & GPU) for Ollama.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB in a single Python notebook.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that threads replies using Ollama models; deploys to Render free tier.

title: ollama-models-hub
summary: Curated list of community-contributed Modelfiles for StableLM, CodeLlama, Vicuna, etc.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async wrappers over the Ollama REST API with Tokio.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that streams Ollama responses with session memory.
